Hunza.description: Home to some of the world's best treks, including the Karakoram range and the Hunza Valley.
Hunza.name: Hunza Valley

Naran-Kaghan.description: A tourist destination, owing to its pleasant weather during peak season. Famous for its lush green valleys.
Naran-Kaghan.name: Naran Kaghan

Swat.description: Known as the Switzerland of Pakistan due to its stunning green valleys and scenic mountain views.
Swat.name: Swat Valley

Murree.description: Famous for its scenic beauty, lush green hills, and cool climate, it is a popular hill station in Pakistan.
Murree.name: Murree

Skardu.description: Known for its breathtaking landscapes, including Shigar Fort and the beautiful Shangrila Resort.
Skardu.name: Skardu

Fairy Meadows.description: A lush green plateau with views of Nanga Parbat, the ninth-highest mountain in the world.
Fairy Meadows.name: Fairy Meadows

Lahore.description: Known for its historical landmarks such as Badshahi Mosque, Lahore Fort, and vibrant culture.
Lahore.name: Lahore

Karimabad.description: The main town in Hunza, known for its rich culture, beautiful valleys, and the ancient Baltit Fort.
Karimabad.name: Karimabad

Ratti Gali Lake.description: A high-altitude alpine glacial lake located in Azad Kashmir, known for its turquoise waters.
Ratti Gali Lake.name: Ratti Gali Lake

Ziarat.description: Famous for its Juniper forests and historical significance, Ziarat is a peaceful hill station.
Ziarat.name: Ziarat

Islamabad.description: The capital of Pakistan, known for its lush greenery, landmarks like Faisal Mosque, and scenic trails.
Islamabad.name: Islamabad

Balakot.description: A popular spot for nature lovers with serene landscapes and a base for treks to the Naran-Kaghan valley.
Balakot.name: Balakot

Attabad Lake.description: A beautiful lake formed after a landslide in 2010, known for its stunning turquoise waters.
Attabad Lake.name: Attabad Lake

Chitral.description: A peaceful area located in the north-western region of Pakistan, known for its natural beauty and cultural diversity.
Chitral.name: Chitral

Khunjerab Pass.description: The highest paved international border crossing in the world, connecting Pakistan to China.
Khunjerab Pass.name: Khunjerab Pass

Gilgit.description: A major city in the Gilgit-Baltistan region, known for its stunning mountain views and trekking routes.
Gilgit.name: Gilgit

Kotli.description: A beautiful city in Azad Kashmir, known for its pleasant weather and scenic valleys.
Kotli.name: Kotli

Neelum Valley.description: Known for its lush greenery, waterfalls, and rivers, it is a popular tourist destination in Azad Kashmir.
Neelum Valley.name: Neelum Valley
